amendment.description: To provide clarifying language that instructs the Federal Highway Administration to extend through February 29, 2004, existing research contracts funded under the TEA-21.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1955 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1955 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Thomas. (consideration: CR S13121-13122; text: CR S13121) To provide clarifying language that instructs the Federal Highway Administration to extend through February 29, 2004, existing research contracts funded under the TEA-21.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1955 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1955 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Thomas.
